mapper.sql: id, name, code, cmcp, priority, hspaas_template_id, status, remark, access_code, account, pay_type, balance, mobile_size, packets_size, connection_size, read_timeout, ext_number, born_term, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into mms_passage (name, code, cmcp, priority, hspaas_template_id, status, remark, access_code, account, pay_type, balance, mobile_size, packets_size, connection_size, read_timeout, ext_number, born_term, create_time, update_time ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hspaasTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packetsSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{connectionSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bornTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update mms_passage
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
hspaas_template_id = #{hspaasTemplateId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_code = #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile_size = #{mobileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
packets_size = #{packetsSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
connection_size = #{connectionSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
read_timeout = #{readTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ext_number = #{extNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
born_term = #{bornTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mms_passage set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, hspaas_template_id = #{hspaasTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_code = #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile_size = #{mobileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, packets_size = #{packetsSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, connection_size = #{connectionSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_timeout = #{readTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext_number = #{extNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, born_term = #{bornTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(id) from mms_passage
name like '%${keyword}%'

select
from mms_passage where status = 0 order by id desc

select passage.id, passage.name, passage.code, passage.cmcp, passage.hspaas_template_id, passage.status, passage.remark, passage.access_code, passage.account, passage.pay_type, passage.balance, passage.packets_size, passage.mobile_size, passage.connection_size, passage.read_timeout, passage.born_term, passage.create_time, passage.modify_time, detail.priority from mms_passage passage join mms_passage_group_detail detail on passage.id = detail.passage_id join mms_passage_group gp on detail.group_id = gp.id where gp.id = #{groupId} order by detail.priority asc

select
from mms_passage where status = 0 and (cmcp = #{0} or cmcp = 4)

select distinct sp.id,sp.name,sp.cmcp,spgd.priority from mms_passage sp inner join mms_passage_group_detail spgd on sp.id=spgd.passage_id where spgd.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (sp.cmcp=#{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sp.cmcp=4) and spgd.route_type=#{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sp.status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by spgd.priority asc

select
from mms_passage where status = 0 and type = 0 and (cmcp = #{0} or cmcp = 4)

select distinct s.* from mms_passage s,mms_passage_province p where s.id = p.passage_id and (s.cmcp = #{cmcp} or s.cmcp = 4) and (p.province_code = #{provinceCode} or p.province_code = 0) order by s.id desc
select s.id, s.status, s.create_time from mms_passage s where s.code = #{code} limit 1
